articles.title: 'I'm not a paedophile': Dee Kosh breaks silence on scandal - AsiaOne
articles.description: Nearly one and a half years after he was accused of harassing teenage boys, Dee Kosh is finally ready to speak. In a 10-minute YouTube video on Wednesday (Jan 26), the 33-year-old said that he wanted to tell his side of the story. "I am not a paedophile, I ne…
articles.content:
Nearly one and a half years after he was accused of harassing teenage boys, Dee Kosh is finally ready to speak.

articles.title: Netizens fume over Thai cafe customer's rude behaviour towards cat - The Star Online
articles.description: BANGKOK (The Nation/Asia News Network): A TikTok clip showing a male customer at a cat café throwing a cat out of the shop to the dangerous roadside has infuriated netizens.
articles.content:

articles.title: Unprofessional handling of bio-bubble resulted in ‘destroying dreams’ of women’s football team: Coach Thomas Dennerby - The Indian Express
articles.description: Thomas Dennerby accuses Asian Football Confederation of delay in disclosing Covid-19 positive results among hotel staff where team was staying.
articles.content: India womens coach Thomas Dennerby blamed the Asian Football Confederation (AFC) for destroying the teams dreams and accused them of unprofessional handling of the bio-bubble, which led to a Covid-19… [+2259 chars]

articles.title: Keisuke Ramen is closing its Cineleisure and Clarke Quay outlets permanently - AsiaOne
